channel.title: Since all Tuts were Deleted, Help me <.< plz
channel.description:
I would like to make all my skillcapes only able to wear at a lvl 99 skill, so I want to add requirements to them
I can i do it?
Thanks.

item.title: Since all Tuts were Deleted, Help me <.< plz
item.dc:creator: @iceyfang iceyfang
item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

Open client.java and search for:In client.java search for

boolean process()

Under it you add this code

if (playerEquipment[player*1] == *2 && playerLevel[*3] <= *4) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerX1], *5);
sendMessage("*6");
}

replace the following variables

*1: Name of the equipment slot, i.e. playerHelmet, playerCape, playerWeapon, playerRing, playerArrows
*2: ID of the item you want the requirment to be for
*3: the # of the level you want the requirment to be for, example, Range = 99, hp = 99, etc.
*4: the level requirment -1, example: item requires 55 mage, you would put 54 for *4
*5: the ammount of the item being removed, would be used for darts, arrows, knives etc.
*6: the message you want sent if they cant wear it.

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Vert Vert
item.description:
@Vert wrote:

[quote="Evan, post:3, topic:173677"][code]if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073 == true) {// Evan
}
if (playerLevel[0] <= 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { // If you are lvl 98 or lower you cannot wear cape!
remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1);
sendMessage(“You Need 99 attack To Wear This Cape!”);
}
[/code]
add that under boolean process,this is only th attack cape but build off of it.[/quote]

Oh ya Now I remember, Thanks ;).

item.dc:creator: @durent durent
item.description:
@durent wrote:

Yea man your going to have to look in client and find “get CLattack” find the last one after that theres were u add ur skill cape item name or number theres a really good tut for it but its long, i could make a tut but im not really in the mood right now =( but if u can understand that there are CL’s for all skills u just have to make them, theres a list that says CLattack,CLrange bla bla bla for like 5 skills u need to add farming and stuff, also at bottom of last Clattack theres item number and a thing that says return [number] what ever number that is is the skill level requirement so if that helps at all welcome.
